_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_AdjustDateTimeForDayLightSaving

9248008e-2c2c-4eea-bb28-4a3c89838403.name: CMGT_UTIL_RemoveRecordRelationshipsWithSingleKey_Reducer
9248008e-2c2c-4eea-bb28-4a3c89838403.sail_code:
if(
  runtimetypeof(ri!key) <> 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordRelationship',
  ri!record,
  a!match(
    value: index(ri!record, ri!key, null),
    whenTrue: count(fv!value) = 1,
    then: with(
      local!indexedValue: index(
        ri!record,
        ri!key,
        1,
        index(ri!record, ri!key, null)
      ),
      local!subKeys: a!keys(local!indexedValue),
      if(
        length(local!subKeys) = 1,
        remove(ri!record, ri!key),
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
          ri!record,
          ri!key,
          reduce(
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_RemoveRecordRelationshipsWithSingleKey_Reducer(record: _, key: _),
            local!indexedValue,
            local!subKeys
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    default: ri!record
  )
)

_a-0000eaa7-a5c0-8000-9c22-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eaa7-a5c0-8000-9c22-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!CMGT_UTIL_SetRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    /*reduce over updates to remove any relationships that were incorrectly created with just an fk*/
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!fksToParent),
      local!updates,
      reduce(
        rule!CMGT_UTIL_RemoveRecordRelationshipsWithSingleKey_Reducer(record: _, key: _),
        local!updates,
        a!keys(local!updates)
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000eaab-5303-8000-9c24-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_formatEventInitiator

_a-0000ec46-ed50-8000-9bb4-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_UTIL_SortArray

_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_Role_AddEvent_Constructor

0008ec12-8412-8000-fa3e-7f0000014e7a.name: CMGT_EXT_Task_Update

_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_Comments_GenerateComments_Logic
_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!commentRule: index(
    rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_ReturnDatsetDetailsByDatasetName(datasetUuids: ri!datasetUuids),
    "commentRule",
    null
  ),
  local!comment:a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(local!commentRule, fv!item())
  ),
  local!documents: rule!CMGT_QR_GetDocument(
    returnType: "OBJECT_ARRAY",
    caseId: ri!caseId,
    fields: {
      recordType!CMGT_Document.documentId,
      recordType!CMGT_Document.documentName
    }
  ),
  local!comments: if(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!comment),
    null,
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: local!comment,
      field: { "caseTitle", "taskTitle", "caseType" },
      value: { ri!caseTitle, ri!taskTitle, ri!caseType }
    )
  ),
  local!parentCommentTimestamp: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
    fromDate: ri!timestamp,
    toDate: if(
      rule!CMGT_EXT_AddDateTimeWithAdjustedDayLightSaving(startDateTime: ri!timestamp, days: 5) > now(),
      now(),
      rule!CMGT_EXT_AddDateTimeWithAdjustedDayLightSaving(startDateTime: ri!timestamp, days: 5)
    ),
    returnCount: if(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!comments),
      0,
      length(local!comments)
    ),
    sortAscending: true
  ),
  if(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!comments),
    {},
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!comments,
      expression: a!localVariables(
        local!commentTimestamp: index(
          local!parentCommentTimestamp,
          fv!index,
          null
        ),
        local!userTagsPerComment: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 0, 1 }),
        local!commentUser: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomXMembersFromGroup(
          group: cons!CMGT_GRP_INTERNAL_USERS,
          includeServiceAccounts: false()
        ),
        local!commentDocuments: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
          records: local!documents,
          field: recordType!CMGT_Document.documentName,
          value: fv!item.parentComment.linkedDocuments
        ),
        local!childCommentTimestamps: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
          fromDate: local!commentTimestamp,
          toDate: if(
            rule!CMGT_EXT_AddDateTimeWithAdjustedDayLightSaving(
              startDateTime: local!commentTimestamp,
              days: 5
            ) > now(),
            now(),
            rule!CMGT_EXT_AddDateTimeWithAdjustedDayLightSaving(
              startDateTime: local!commentTimestamp,
              days: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 5 })
            )
          ),
          returnCount: count(fv!item.childComments),
          sortAscending: true
        ),
        recordType!CMGT_Comment(
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentText: fv!item.parentComment.commentText,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.caseId: ri!caseId,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.taskId: ri!taskId,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.isBookmarked: a!defaultValue(
            index(
              fv!item.parentComment,
              "isBookmarked",
              null
            ),
            false
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.isActive: true(),
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.isPrivate: true,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.hasBeenEdited: false(),
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdBy: local!commentUser,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdOn: local!commentTimestamp,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedBy: local!commentUser,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedOn: local!commentTimestamp,
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.userTags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: enumerate(local!userTagsPerComment),
            expression: recordType!CMGT_CommentUserTag(
              recordType!CMGT_CommentUserTag.username: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomXMembersFromGroup(
                group: cons!CMGT_GRP_INTERNAL_USERS,
                includeServiceAccounts: false(),
                excludeUsers: local!commentUser
              ),
              recordType!CMGT_CommentUserTag.isActive: true()
            )
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.childComments: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: fv!item.childComments,
            expression: a!localVariables(
              local!childCommentUser: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomXMembersFromGroup(
                group: cons!CMGT_GRP_INTERNAL_USERS,
                includeServiceAccounts: false()
              ),
              local!childCommentDocuments: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
                records: local!documents,
                field: recordType!CMGT_Document.documentName,
                value: fv!item.linkedDocuments
              ),
              recordType!CMGT_Comment(
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentText: fv!item.commentText,
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.caseId: ri!caseId,
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.taskId: ri!taskId,
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.isBookmarked: a!defaultValue(
                  index(fv!item, "isBookmarked", null),
                  false
                ),
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.isActive: true(),
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.isPrivate: true,
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.hasBeenEdited: false(),
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdBy: local!childCommentUser,
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdOn: local!childCommentTimestamps[fv!index],
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedBy: local!childCommentUser,
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedOn: local!childCommentTimestamps[fv!index],
                recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentDocumentMap: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: local!childCommentDocuments,
                  expression: recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap(
                    recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap.documentId: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Document.documentId],
                    recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap.isActive: true(),
                    recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap.commentAction: "LINK"
                  )
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentDocumentMap: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: local!commentDocuments,
            expression: recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap(
              recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap.documentId: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Document.documentId],
              recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap.isActive: true(),
              recordType!CMGT_CommentDocumentMap.commentAction: "LINK"
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e9ae-873e-8000-9baf-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_QR_GetUser
_a-0000e9ae-873e-8000-9baf-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: #"urn:appian:record-type:v1:SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER",
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  filters: {
    ri!additionalFilters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER/SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER_FIELD_username",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!username
    )
  },
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpressions: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  groupByFields: ri!groupByFields,
  searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
  searchFields: ri!searchFields
)

_a-0000ece2-0128-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_CalculateDueDateBasedOnSLA
_a-0000ece2-0128-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  any(a!isNullOrEmpty, { ri!dateTime, ri!SLA }),
  null(),
  a!localVariables(
    local!details: cast(
      'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Map',
      if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!SLA),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(ri!SLA),
        null
      )
    ),
    local!days: a!defaultValue(
      value: index(local!details, "days", null()),
      default: 0
    ),
    local!hours: a!defaultValue(
      value: index(local!details, "hours", null()),
      default: 0
    ),
    local!minutes: a!defaultValue(
      value: index(local!details, "minutes", null()),
      default: 0
    ),
    local!isBusinessDays: a!defaultValue(
      value: index(local!details, "isBusinessDays", false()),
      default: false()
    ),
    a!addDateTime(
      startDateTime: ri!dateTime,
      days: local!days,
      hours: local!hours,
      minutes: local!minutes,
      useProcessCalendar: local!isBusinessDays
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ea01-8773-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_SetForeignKey

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_ENUM_DATASET
_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The data rules for each type are mapped and retrieved with the dataset name where necessary.Here we are having the rule names without () and will be adding '()' in the rules where these rules are used
    datasetName --> The constant containing the name of the dataset
    caseRule-->The name of the rule containing the cases data for the dataset type
    studioFieldsRule -->The name of the rule containing the studio fields data for the dataset type
    referenceTaskRule --> The name of the rule containing the reference tasks data for the dataset type
    taskBlockRule --> The name of the rule containing the task block rule for the dataset type
    caseTypeWorkflowRule --> The name of the rule containing the case type workflow rule for the dataset type
    documentRule --> The name of the rule containing the document rule for the dataset type
    commentRule --> The name of the rule containing the comment rule for the dataset type
    taskUpdateRule -->The name of the rule containing the task status update rule for the dataset type
    deployments --> The respective dataset deployments needs to be passed in the below structure
        a!map(
            onInitialLoad: a!map(
                              packageZip --> The package to be deployed only on initial deployment ,
                              scripts--> The scriptsto be deployed only on initial deployment
                              icfFile--> The ICF file to be deployed only on initial deployment
                              ),
            onEachLoad: a!map(
                              packageZip --> The package to be deployed on each load except the initial load ,
                              scripts--> The scripts to be deployed on each load except the initial load 
                              icfFile--> The ICF file to be deployed on each load except the initial load 
                              ),
    )              
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
{
  a!map(
    datasetName: cons!CMGT_EXT_DATASET_RESIDENTIAL_PERMIT,
    datasetUuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[1],
    caseRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Case,
    studioFieldsRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_CaseStudioFields,
    referenceTaskRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_ReferenceTasks,
    taskBlockRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_TaskBlocks,
    caseTypeWorkflowRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_WorkflowTasks,
    documentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Documents,
    commentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Comments,
    taskUpdateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Task_StatusUpdate,
    automationRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_AutomationRules,
    emailTemplateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_EmailTemplates
  ),
  a!map(
    datasetName: cons!CMGT_EXT_DATASET_FRAUDULENT_TRANSACTIONS,
    datasetUuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[2],
    caseRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Case,
    studioFieldsRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_CaseStudioFields,
    referenceTaskRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_ReferenceTasks,
    taskBlockRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_TaskBlocks,
    caseTypeWorkFlowRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_WorkflowTasks,
    documentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Documents,
    commentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Comments,
    taskUpdateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Task_StatusUpdate,
    automationRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_AutomationRules,
    emailTemplateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_EmailTemplates
  )
}

_a-0000eab0-e049-8000-9c27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eab0-e049-8000-9c27-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
        records: pv![the pv to write],
        relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
      )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(
      record: _,
      relationship: _
    ),
    fv!item,
    ri!relationships
  )
)

_a-0000e98b-cfe0-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_QR_GetDocument
_a-0000e98b-cfe0-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!CMGT_Document,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  filters: {
    ri!additionalFilters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.caseId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!caseId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.taskId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!taskId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.documentId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!documentId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.commentDocumentMap.commentId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!commentId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.documentName,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!documentFileNames
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.modifiedOn,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!includeModifiedOn
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.modifiedOn,
      operator: "<>",
      value: ri!excludeModifiedOn
    )
  },
  fields: {
    ri!fields,
    recordType!CMGT_Document.case,
    recordType!CMGT_Document.task,
    recordType!CMGT_Document.createdByUser,
    recordType!CMGT_Document.modifiedByUser
  },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!sort,
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Document.createdOn,
      ascending: false
    )
  ),
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  groupByFields: ri!groupByFields,
  logicalExpressions: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
  searchFields: ri!searchFields
)

_a-0000e9fa-aa45-8000-9bda-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_CaseEventHistory_Constructor
_a-0000e9fa-aa45-8000-9bda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Case(
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Case.caseId: ri!caseId,
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Case.timestamp: a!defaultValue(value: ri!timestamp, default: now()),
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Case.username: rule!CMGT_formatEventInitiator(initiator: ri!initiator),
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Case.caseEventTypeId: ri!eventTypeId,
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Case.details: if(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!details),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"(
      value: ri!details,
      removeNullOrEmptyFields: false
    ),
    null
  )
)

_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_AddDateTimeWithAdjustedDayLightSaving
_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_EXT_AdjustDateTimeForDayLightSaving(
  datetime: a!addDateTime(
    startDateTime: ri!startDateTime,
    years: ri!years,
    months: ri!months,
    days: ri!days,
    hours: ri!hours,
    minutes: ri!minutes,
    seconds: ri!seconds,
    useProcessCalendar: ri!useProcessCalendar,
    processCalendarName: ri!processCalendarName
  )
)

_a-0000ea0e-71db-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_TaskEventHistory_Constructor
_a-0000ea0e-71db-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Task(
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Task.taskId: ri!taskId,
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Task.timestamp: a!defaultValue(value: ri!timestamp, default: now()),
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Task.username: rule!CMGT_formatEventInitiator(initiator: ri!initiator),
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Task.taskEventTypeId: ri!eventTypeId,
  recordType!CMGT_EventHistory_Task.details: if(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!details),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"(value: ri!details),
    null
  )
)

af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    apply(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_CreateFieldValuePair(
        field: _,
        value: ri!value,
        allFields: a!flatten(ri!field)
      ),
      a!flatten(ri!field)
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_UTIL_ReturnDatsetDetailsByDatasetName
_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
    records: rule!CMGT_EXT_ENUM_DATASET(),
    field: "datasetUuid",
    value: ri!datasetUuids
  ),
  cast(typeof(a!map()), fv!item)
)
